MyList.title: List 1
paragraph: 1- BLACK RUSSIA CRMP - large-scale multiplayer project, developed on the basis of the cult shooter GTA San Andreas.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/Black-Russia-RP/main/u1.png
2- It is noteworthy that the creation of the game is not a professional studio, but a community of fans.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/Black-Russia-RP/main/u2.png
3- Review BLACK RUSSIA CRMP cannot boast the presence of a full-fledged storyline, as the emphasis is on multiplayer gameplay.

MyList.title: List 2
paragraph: 1- Instead of a story, the game allows you to build your own life in the virtual world: to become an ordinary worker, a politician or choose the criminal path that allows you to succeed as quickly as possible.
2- Gamers are able to unite in small factions to achieve common goals, such as pushing back territory and other gangs, making raids and robbing jewelry stores, trains or banks.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/Black-Russia-RP/main/u5.png
3- The objective of Black Russia RP is to explore a criminal Russia over the network and find a lot of cars that you could see in your life.
4- Players can also wield the powers of damnation to both help and harm the people of their Russian village.

MyList.title: List 3
paragraph: 1- The game is a First-Person Shooter released on the PlayStation 2 and Xbox in 2006.
2- It was made by Criterion Games, who also developed the Burnout series.
3- There are also helper apps available on Google Play Store.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/Black-Russia-RP/main/u3.png
4- and other websites that can help players understand the basics of the game and show them how to get money and cars.

MyList.title: List 4
paragraph: 1- Gameplay Among the main gameplay chips of the action thriller BLACK RUSSIA CRMP should be highlighted: Events take place on the streets of several major cities, including Moscow and St.
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fluxappsltd/Black-Russia-RP/main/u4.png
2- Petersburg, and all of these locations are completely open to explore and do not contain loading screens.
3- There are features for pumping skills, like weapons possession, riding, hand-to-hand combat and so on.
4- There is a certain hierarchy in the underworld, and the gamer has to start from the bottom gradually reaching the role of the boss.
5- It is possible to buy real estate, open businesses, buy luxury items and cars. There is a function to create your own grouping.
6- There is a built in chat, through which using voice commands, you can easily communicate with other members of the gang.
